General.Name: Nickel Creek Platinum Corp
General.Description: Nickel Creek Platinum Corp. engages in the exploration, evaluation, and development of nickel and platinum group metals (PGM) in North America. The company's flagship property is the Nickel-Copper-PGM Shäw project located in the southwestern Yukon Territory, Canada. The company was formerly known as Wellgreen Platinum Ltd. and changed its name to Nickel Creek Platinum Corp. in January 2018. Nickel Creek Platinum Corp. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 666 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2X8
